explains: n. （光学仪器的）镜头，光学部件；奥普蒂克量杯（酒吧用以量烈性酒）；<古>眼睛
wordGroup: fiber optic adj. 光学纤维的 , n. 光纤，光纤技术
fiber optic cable 光缆，光纤；纤维光缆的
optic axis n. 光轴，眼轴；视轴
optic canal 视神经管；视管
optic disk 视（乳头）盘；视神经乳头

sentences.en: The optic nerve is a part of the brain.
sentences.cn: 视觉神经是大脑的一部分。

sentences.en: Reparies to the nervous system will start with optic nerves and, in time, the spinal cord.
sentences.cn: 对神经系统的修复将从视神经开始，并适时地从脊髓开始。

sentences.en: The development of fiber-optic cables allowed for billions of bits of information to be received every minute.
sentences.cn: 光纤电缆的发展使得每分钟都有数十亿比特的信息被接收。
